attributes.action: Make halal killing illegal due to the animal cruelty
attributes.additional_details: The animal is suffering and due to the fear is flooded with adrenaline. Halal is cruel and should not be allowed in a Christian country.
attributes.background: Stop the halal butchers in the uk. We are no longer stand for the animal cruelty. We need to make it illegal to have animals killed in the way they are under the halal way.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729708
